testCases.name: Successful Login and Product Listing Navigation
testCases.description: Authenticate with valid credentials and verify successful navigation to the main product listing page, setting up the context for further flows requiring authentication.

testCases.name: Add Product to Cart and Review Cart Contents
testCases.description: Select a product from the listing, add it to the shopping cart, and verify that it appears with the correct details in the cart contents overview, preparing for checkout or further cart actions.

testCases.name: Complete Checkout with Valid Information
testCases.description: Proceed through the entire checkout process by providing required user information and finalizing the order, then verify the display of an order completion confirmation message.

testCases.name: Initiate Logout and Return to Login Page
testCases.description: Access the global navigation menu to trigger logout, confirming that the user session is cleared and the application returns to the initial login page.

testCases.name: Login with valid credentials
testCases.description: Verify that the user can log in with an accepted username and the correct password, resulting in redirection to the product listing page.

testCases.name: Login with invalid credentials
testCases.description: Verify that login fails with an incorrect username or password, displaying an appropriate error message on the login form.

testCases.name: Password field masking
testCases.description: Verify that the password input is masked to ensure credentials are not visible when entered.

testCases.name: View product listing after login
testCases.description: Verify that all available products are visible with images, names, descriptions, and prices after a valid login.

testCases.name: Sort products using dropdown
testCases.description: Verify that the sorting dropdown is present and sorting options reorder products accordingly, e.g., by name A-Z.

testCases.name: View product details
testCases.description: Verify that selecting a product image or name navigates to the product details, which include full product information.

testCases.name: Add product to cart and check badge update
testCases.description: Verify that adding a product to the cart increments the shopping cart badge and updates the cart summary.

testCases.name: Remove product from cart and check updates
testCases.description: Verify that removing a product from the cart decrements the cart badge and updates the cart summary in real time.

testCases.name: View cart contents and verify accuracy
testCases.description: Verify that the user can view the contents of the shopping cart, including product names, quantities, and total costs.

testCases.name: Complete checkout with valid information
testCases.description: Verify that entering a valid first name, last name, and postal code allows the user to complete checkout and displays the 'Thank you for your order!' confirmation.

testCases.name: Checkout form validation for blank fields
testCases.description: Verify that submitting the checkout form with blank required fields prompts user-friendly validation errors.

testCases.name: Order completion feedback verification
testCases.description: Verify that after a successful purchase, a distinct completion message and a 'Back Home' button are displayed, providing clear feedback to the user.

userStories.userStoryName: Navigation Using Burger Menu and Global Links

testCases.name: Open burger menu and access navigation options
testCases.description: Verify that the burger menu is accessible on every page and reveals navigation links to All Items, About, Logout, and Reset App State.

testCases.name: Use cart and footer links across pages
testCases.description: Verify that the cart and social links are accessible and functional from all pages, ensuring persistent global navigation.

testCases.name: Logout functionality
testCases.description: Verify that selecting logout from the burger menu returns the user instantly to the login page and clears the session context.

testCases.name: Verify presence of social links in footer
testCases.description: Verify that footer areas display links to Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn on every page.

testCases.name: External redirection for social links
testCases.description: Verify that each social media link opens in a new tab or window and navigates to the brandâ€™s respective pages, preserving the session in the current tab.
